item.title: Crew Rest Area Smoke Detection System

numlitem.para: If any crew rest area is placarded CREW REST AREA SMOKE DET SYS INOP – DO NOT ENTER, do not use the affected crew rest area for any purpose.

note.para: International flights may be affected if crew rest area or supernumerary seats are deemed unusable.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "CREW REST AREA SMOKE DET SYS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Confirm normal detector operation by noting the following while the self test switch on detector’s faceplate is depressed:
Caution message> SMOKE CREW REST displays on EICAS.
The detector’s alarm horn sounds off.
Disconnect, cap and stow the inoperative detector’s electrical connector (AMM 26-14-21, page 401).
Crew Rest Area smoke detectors are identical and interchangeable. If the center detector (STA 595, BL 0, WL 391) is inoperative, it may be interchanged with an operable detector from a bunk bed room.
